function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inefficient thermal installations and power appliances leading to increased indoor energy consumption","Impact":"Higher energy consumption in lockdown contexts, affecting environmental and financial sustainability","Mitigation":"Improving efficiency of thermal installations and power appliances, promoting awareness of renewable energy use","Technologies":"Energy-efficient appliances, renewable energy systems, smart home technologies","People":"Households, building occupants","Owner":"Energy service companies, building owners, occupants"},{"Description":"Inadequate storage and space for domestic tasks leading to overcrowding and lack of essential space","Impact":"Reduced quality of domestic spaces, discomfort, and inconvenience for occupants","Mitigation":"Rearranging and optimizing space for domestic tasks, outsourcing or relocating certain uses, promoting better storage solutions","Technologies":"Smart storage solutions, space optimization tools, community-based task sharing platforms","People":"Households, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, building management teams"},{"Description":"Limited access to open-air spaces and nature contact leading to reduced well-being of occupants","Impact":"Reduced mental and physical well-being, lack of recreation and connection with nature","Mitigation":"Recovering open spaces, promoting outdoor recreation and leisure activities, establishing urban gardens","Technologies":"Smart outdoor design, urban gardening tools, community gardening platforms","People":"Households, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, landscape designers, building management teams"}]}
